Abada Joggers

Elevate your capoeira performance with the best capoeira abadas online... or offline.

Abada Jogger is here to offer you an alternative to the mob of unflattering capoeira uniforms out there.

Made with the most luxurious 4-way stretch polyester, Abada Jogger is mid-rise and tapered fit that bring comfort and style to your capoeira journey.

Tired of uniforms that hinder your game?

Are you tired of searching for capoeira pants that just don’t cut it?

  • They don't stay up without a chord!
  • Too tight around the hips, and too loose at the legs.
  • Low cuts are very uncomfortable
  • The fabric is thin and see-through.
  • You spend $$$ going to the tailor.

I've personally felt your frustration. And I invite you to choose capoeira pants that are crafted by someone who has felt your pain.

It’s time to buy abadas that don’t hold you back!

Don’t look any futher, we have you covered!

Your Journey Reinvented

Abadas that combine style, comfort, and performance.
Elevate your Capoeira game with gear that works as hard as you do.

4-WAY STRETCH

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

TAPERED FIT

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

ELASTIC WAISTBAND

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

ZIPPERED POCKET

Keeps you dry during long training sessions and reduces chaffing and discomfort caused by sweat. Our fabric keeps you feeling fresh, allowing you to focus on you game.

Frequently Asked Questions

Shipping & Delivery

We process and ship all orders within 1-3 business days. Standard ground shipping takes 4-7 business days for Domestic (USA) and 7-21 business days for International. For more details, check our Return Policy.

Are these pants see-through?

This is a common concern with white abadas! We specifically chose a thicker, high-quality material so you can feel comfortable moving, kicking, and training, knowing that your Abadas are not see-through.

Can I wear my cordão (cord) with these pants?

Yes, absolutely! These Abadas are designed to be a superior alternative to ill-fitting uniforms. You can wear your cordão with them comfortably. They are also stylish enough for street rodas or casual training.

My Mestre says these are not "traditional" Abadas.

The "traditional" style is often just a specific style from the 60s/70s, not anything connected to the origin of the art. We believe in evolving to improve the student's experience. While we don't advise defying your group's uniform policy, we hope these pants offer a better training option.

How do I choose my size?

Check our Sizing Guide on the product page. Be aware the waistband has an elastic fit, offering a flexible fit range. You'll see this in the sizing guide.

Are these pants unisex?

Yes! Our Abada Joggers are designed to look great on all body types. They are worn and loved by both men and women across the Capoeira community.

How do I wash and care for my Abada Joggers?

IMPORTANT: Do not use bleach on these Abadas! Bleach will react with the material and leave permanent yellow stains. Otherwise, you can wash and dry them just like any other athletic pants or high-performance gear.

Can you supply our Capoeira school?

Yes! We love working with schools to provide comfortable, professional uniforms, customized with your groups logo. We offer transparent bulk pricing—check out our calculator on the Bulk Orders page.
